io.vertx.rxjava.ext.auth

Class AuthService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.vertx.rxjava.ext.auth.AuthService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShiroAuthService

    public class AuthService
extends Object
    Vert.x authentication and authorisation service.

    Handles authentication and role/permission based authorisation.

    NOTE: This class has been automatically generated from the original non RX-ified interface using Vert.x codegen.

      • createFromClassName

        public static AuthService createFromClassName(Vertx vertx,
                                              String className,
                                              JsonObject config)
        Create an auth service instance using the specified auth provider class name.
        Parameters:
        vertx - the Vert.x instance
        className - the fully qualified class name of the auth provider implementation class
        config - the configuration to pass to the provider
        Returns:
        the auth service

      • createEventBusProxy

        public static AuthService createEventBusProxy(Vertx vertx,
                                              String address)
        Create a proxy to an auth service that is deployed somwehere on the event bus.
        Parameters:
        vertx - the vert.x instance
        address - the address on the event bus where the auth service is listening
        Returns:
        the proxy

      • login

        public AuthService login(JsonObject credentials,
                         Handler<AsyncResult<String>> resultHandler)
        Authenticate (login) using the specified credentials. The contents of the credentials depend on what the auth provider is expecting. The default login ID timeout will be used.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials
        resultHandler - will be passed a failed result if login failed or will be passed a succeeded result containing the login ID (a string) if login was successful.
        Returns:

      • loginObservable

        public rx.Observable<String> loginObservable(JsonObject credentials)
        Authenticate (login) using the specified credentials. The contents of the credentials depend on what the auth provider is expecting. The default login ID timeout will be used.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials
        Returns:

      • loginWithTimeout

        public AuthService loginWithTimeout(JsonObject credentials,
                                    long timeout,
                                    Handler<AsyncResult<String>> resultHandler)
        Authenticate (login) using the specified credentials. The contents of the credentials depend on what the auth provider is expecting. The specified login ID timeout will be used.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials
        timeout - the login timeout to use, in ms
        resultHandler - will be passed a failed result if login failed or will be passed a succeeded result containing the login ID (a string) if login was successful.
        Returns:

      • loginWithTimeoutObservable

        public rx.Observable<String> loginWithTimeoutObservable(JsonObject credentials,
                                                        long timeout)
        Authenticate (login) using the specified credentials. The contents of the credentials depend on what the auth provider is expecting. The specified login ID timeout will be used.
        Parameters:
        credentials - the credentials
        timeout - the login timeout to use, in ms
        Returns:

        Parameters:
